message.content: {"given_definition_quality":72,"better_definition":"book","sentence":"她有书。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation of a woman (simple, HSK1 style) holding a book open in her hands, gentle fading landscapes in the background, dust and gentle light falling on her and the book, warm muted colors, focus on the book and a sense of calm discovery.","sentence_translation":"She has a book."}
